properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Agentic AI integration.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.framework
properties.description: The AI framework implementation to use with the Agentic AI integration.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.aiagent.outbound-connector.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the AI Agent outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.aiagent.job-worker.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the AI Agent Ad-Hoc Sub-Process job worker.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.ad-hoc-tools-schema-resolver.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the Ad-hoc tools schema outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.client.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the MCP Client outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.client.framework
properties.description: The MCP Client framework to use.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.remote-client.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the MCP Remote Client outbound connector.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.mcp.remote-client.framework
properties.description: The MCP Remote Client framework to use.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.a2a.client.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the A2A Client connectors.

properties.name: camunda.connector.agenticai.a2a.client.polling.task.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable/register the A2A task polling inbound connector.
